@proteq thanks for your patch - we did some research into this directions as well and it will no work globally.

the issue is within the php implementation on windows and there is nothing you can really do.
we are in contact with microsoft to find a solution.

at the end we decided to 'sluggify' the file and folder names before writing them to disk.
in return reading non-ascii file names causes issue - you shall not drop files into the data folders.
